text: That's what keeps me up at three in the morning: Who's looking at reviews of Cabin Boy right now?
author: Chris Elliott

text: I think it's probably best to work out in the morning to get it out of the way. My ultimate top tip is to drag yourself, even if you have to roll yourself out of your bed and in to a sit-up - it's really not that bad once you start.
author: Lily James

text: The sound of the blades on the ice in the morning is like smelling fresh coffee.
author: Tara Lipinski

text: New Orleans life is such a night life. The thing that comes up very often is that our day essentially doesn't start until midnight or 2 in the morning.
author: Robert Asprin

text: I like to eat yogurt in the morning. It's easy and quick and available anywhere.
author: Maud Welzen
